attributes.action:
The Removal Of Boris Johnson From Office 
Effective immediately
attributes.additional_details:
Get Rid of him ! Since he's been in Office during this Pandemic he's lied to the British People he's been way too slow in acting against this virus Not closing down the borders when this pandemic first hit th UK Many life could have been saved if he had acted on it sooner  the rule he and his fellow parliament staff have broken over the last Year cannot go unpunished!

I ask  the Government to take this seriously
attributes.background: We the British People want Boris Johnson removed from Office for the pure stupidity that he has caused while in Office

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
